name: Healthier Old Fashioned Potato Salad
author: MakeItHealthy
summary: This is potato salad the old fashioned way - but with more celery, egg whites only (no yolks), fresh seasonings, and low-fat mayonnaise, it's healthier!
directions: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes
Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with water
Bring to a boil, remove from heat, and let eggs stand in hot water for 15 minutes
Remove eggs from hot water, cool under cold running water, and peel
Combine potatoes, egg whites, celery, onion, relish, mayonnaise, mustard, celery seed, garlic, and pepper in a large bowl
Mix together well and refrigerate until chilled
